data.text: @OnlyEnnui @moredadthnalive @KunstJonas Just the way we did it as I researched, we healed blood first (had micro-clotting). We were wasting, so started each day with 50 grams of protein (shakes, bars etc). We didn’t have strength to get out of bed without it. Then did the other items mentioned. We were healthy precovid

@jgise925 @moredadthnalive @KunstJonas How did you do that? 
I have bad reactions to all Jed’s, supplements, foods, anything out on body.
@OnlyEnnui @moredadthnalive @KunstJonas Yea nothing does unfortunately. I think boosting our NO and repairing muscles  first before trying Quercetin may have contributed to our success. We got lucky.
@jgise925 @moredadthnalive @KunstJonas Well, you are lucky then. But it doesn’t  work for everyone.

@OnlyEnnui @moredadthnalive @KunstJonas Really, wow sorry to hear that. For me it was the icing on the cake with helping. What type of reaction did you have? POTS & MCAS were my main issues. I had a severe immediate allergic reaction to the Moderna vax and I swear MCAS had something to do with it. Allergists clueless.
@jgise925 @moredadthnalive @KunstJonas Quercetin causes me to have MCAS reaction.

@moredadthnalive @OnlyEnnui @KunstJonas L-Arginine & BCAA’s helped NO & strength tremendously. We used pure powder form in water w/ flavored electrolytes. And the real game changer was Quercetin supps. When I took my first one, 25 mins later I felt tingling everywhere in a good way, felt it healing.

@moredadthnalive @OnlyEnnui @KunstJonas My husband & I developed long covid ME/CFS. Mine was worse than his. Docs were clueless so it was up to me to get us out of (barely) walking zombies state. Dan Shen Pian cleaned the blood and got it out of the sluggish state. Cod liver oil (vit D & A), low dose iron 1x/wk helped.
@NearFights @AMannanBaig @econcolin @KunstJonas Beet juice increased my sp02 and gave me some energy. Helped with my sob as well
